body_html:
I just ran the test command many times (~10 each) with OMP_NUM_THREADS=2, OMP_NUM_THREADS=3 and OMP_NUM_THREADS not set and got no error. However, I also only have two threads available. Let me try this again using python3.

EDIT: Meanwhile I create a PR to update tbb. - You could try using this as well to see if it helps.

body:
I just ran the test command many times (~10 each) with OMP_NUM_THREADS=2, OMP_NUM_THREADS=3 and OMP_NUM_THREADS not set and got no error. However, I also only have two threads available. Let me try this again using python3.

EDIT: Meanwhile I create [a PR to update tbb](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/7734). - You could try using this as well to see if it helps.
